name: Perseverance 🚀
description:
What is this?

Perseverance is a weird bullet hell shooter where you can receive assistance from other players' comments to get stronger.

For better performance, use the native builds (available for windows, mac & linux).

How do I play?
  • WASD / ZQSD / Arrows: Move around the level
  • Mouse / trackpad: aim your ship
  • Left click / space: shoot missiles
The game is hard, any tips?

This game is made to be challenging until you accept the assistance from other players, keep digging and you will find out what we mean.

How do I help other players?

You can post a comment on this page, and a ship with your username will be created. Players in the game will then have a chance to receive assistance from your ship.

The team
  • Colin Bellino: Design, code, art
  • KotuAlls: Music
